0: The large size of the windows Love the location
Nice room with great view but
The room was great except the bath room need updated and the first thing we saw was a surprise in the toilet

overall I love you experience I was on the 24th floor and I had this trip view it was absolutely amazing the rooms were clean as I expected and everything was in working condition this will not be the last time I visit the FLAMINGO
I arrived on a Friday nite late after a series of storm delayus and upon checking in was given keys to a deluxe room
The rooms and the pool are fantastic if you go to the pool I d recommend getting a day bed
The staff was very cooperative and helpful especially front desk who took care of the room transfer
so niceI would recommend to anyone rooms are inexpensive
The bed was comfortable and the shower in the morning was hot and with good flow
We were given a better room than we thought we had reserved
1: We looked forward to this trip for a long time and due to the condition of our room and no option to move to another room we ended our trip early and came home
The Flamingo rooms especially King Studio need to be standardized
In the bathroom the tv was a nice touch but the sound did not work
We stayed in room 1029 I think in the main tower of the main entrance
They even regret not getting a studio instead
The lady up selled us to their newer rooms
Finally they came up and told us the ac only works with people in the room and to set it on auto
right where I wanted to belong walks to rooms
I was assured I would get the newly renoed rooms
Room was nice but so hot and could n’t get air down
2: But actually we ordered the room at same time on hotelscom
So they were doing me a favor for changing my room so we can shower like human beings lol
When we arrived at our room we discovered nothing had been done
My question is why are you still placing guests in Fab rooms
Also the tub faucet dripped all night
The room was somehow quiet even though the hotel was clearly packed and many college kids there
Though I booked a king strip view I received a 2 queen with view of the High Roller wheel on the opposite side of the hotel from the strip
I am not sure what resort fees are supposed to go for but I would think a comfortable room and even halfway decent customer service would be at least some of that cost
The room we were in on the sixteenth floor was definitely something else
Finally ended up getting another room
3: Room service was a 2 hour wait time and the room was never cleaned daily
The room had no shampoo toilrt paper
My husband called to advise and he thought that the staff would have made a little extra things in our room
The bathroom had a TV in built in the mirror ours was not working I brought this up to reception multiple times but they never bothered to fix it
The room was fairly new some of the lights were not working properly and kept flickering in and out
Room was comfortable but did not really spend that much time in it did not go to casino as not a gambler
Room across mine had a party with over 30 people until 4 in the morning
By the time we were due to leave everything had closed even the room servicing
We overlooked the pool gardens and the big wheel so not on the Strip side which is what we requested
